BadRequest.message: Sorry, but you send something that we cannot understand. Maybe want to check out the API docs?

Gone.message: We are sorry to inform you that the resource has been turned off, please read the docs for a new version

TooManyRequests.message: You are over your Quota Limit

InternalServerError.message: Internal Server Error, We are sorry

BadGateway.message: we are currently upgrading/maintaining our servers. Come again later

ServiceUnavailable.message: We are overloaded. Please try again later

GatewayTimeout.message: There has happened an error in our stack, try again please
